bug.short_desc: Mapping of риа is improper as per standard

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: mapping of риа should be double quote but it is presently "double quote + space"
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): m17n-contrib-1.1.14-2.fc19.noarch
How reproducible: every time
Steps to Reproduce: 1. select Punjabi Inscript 2 layout 2. Type double quote and check 3.
Actual results: риа character not appearing
Expected results: it should appear on double quote
Additional info: attaching patch..
Created attachment 786020 to fix character mapping
